text: The 2006 Northern Iowa Panthers football team represented the University of Northern Iowa in the 2006 NCAA Division I FCS football season. The team was coached by fifth-year head coach Mark Farley and played their home games in the UNI-Dome. ==Schedule== ==Coaching staff== {| class="wikitable" ! Name !! Position !! Year at Northern Iowa !!
